response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. Given its value to you, we understand that this could be a pivotal investment for your company. We are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to the market value of $1,500,000. We believe this price reflects the substantial benefits the product offers while allowing us to ensure its availability for future buyers. We look forward to discussing how this product can support your business goals. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
